<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="2016_UEFA_Team_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:2016_UEFA_Team_of_the_Year" title="Template:2016 UEFA Team of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:2016_UEFA_Team_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:2016 UEFA Team of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:2016_UEFA_Team_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="2016_UEFA_Team_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">2016 <a href="/wiki/UEFA_Team_of_the_Year" title="UEFA Team of the Year">UEFA Team of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li>FW: <a href="/wiki/Fernando_Torres" title="Fernando Torres">Torres</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Ballon d'Or (1956–2009)</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2006 FIFA World Player of the Year">2006</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/15px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/23px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/30px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Fabio_Cannavaro" title="Fabio Cannavaro">Cannavaro</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2007_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2007 FIFA World Player of the Year">2007</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span>  <a href="/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2008_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2008 FIFA World Player of the Year">2008</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/15px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/23px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/30px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2009_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2009 FIFA World Player of the Year">2009</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%"><a href="/wiki/FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or" title="FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">FIFA Ballon d'Or</a></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski">Lewandowski</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Globe_Soccer_Awards_Best_Player" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold; color:Gold (color)"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Globe_Soccer_Awards_best_Player" title="Template:Globe Soccer Awards best Player"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Globe_Soccer_Awards_best_Player" title="Template talk:Globe Soccer Awards best Player"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Globe_Soccer_Awards_best_Player&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Globe_Soccer_Awards_Best_Player" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Globe_Soccer_Awards#Best_Player_of_the_Year_Award" title="Globe Soccer Awards">Globe Soccer Awards Best Player</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<ul><li>1997&#8211;98: <a href="/wiki/Peter_Schmeichel" title="Peter Schmeichel">Schmeichel</a></li>
<li>1998&#8211;99: <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Kahn" title="Oliver Kahn">Kahn</a></li>
<li>1999&#8211;2000: <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Kahn" title="Oliver Kahn">Kahn</a></li>
<li>2000&#8211;01: <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Kahn" title="Oliver Kahn">Kahn</a></li>
<li>2001&#8211;02: <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Kahn" title="Oliver Kahn">Kahn</a></li>
<li>2002&#8211;03: <a href="/wiki/Gianluigi_Buffon" title="Gianluigi Buffon">Buffon</a></li>
<li>2003&#8211;04: <a href="/wiki/V%C3%ADtor_Ba%C3%ADa" title="Vítor Baía">Baía</a></li>
<li>2004&#8211;05: <a href="/wiki/Petr_%C4%8Cech" title="Petr ech">ech</a></li>
<li>2005&#8211;06: <a href="/wiki/Jens_Lehmann" title="Jens Lehmann">Lehmann</a></li>
<li>2006&#8211;07: <a href="/wiki/Petr_%C4%8Cech" title="Petr ech">ech</a></li>
<li>2007&#8211;08: <a href="/wiki/Petr_%C4%8Cech" title="Petr ech">ech</a></li>
<li>2008&#8211;09: <a href="/wiki/Edwin_van_der_Sar" title="Edwin van der Sar">Van der Sar</a></li>
<li>2009&#8211;10: <a href="/wiki/J%C3%BAlio_C%C3%A9sar_(football_goalkeeper,_born_1979)" title="Júlio César (football goalkeeper, born 1979)">Júlio César</a></li>
<li>2010&#8211;16: <i>Not awarded</i></li>

<li>2019&#8211;20: <a href="/wiki/Manuel_Neuer" title="Manuel Neuer">Neuer</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Best Defender</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li>1997&#8211;98: <a href="/wiki/Fernando_Hierro" title="Fernando Hierro">Hierro</a></li>
<li>1998&#8211;99: <a href="/wiki/Jaap_Stam" title="Jaap Stam">Stam</a></li>
<li>1999&#8211;2000: <a href="/wiki/Jaap_Stam" title="Jaap Stam">Stam</a></li>
<li>2000&#8211;01: <a href="/wiki/Roberto_Ayala" title="Roberto Ayala">Ayala</a></li>
<li>2001&#8211;02: <a href="/wiki/Roberto_Carlos" title="Roberto Carlos">Roberto Carlos</a></li>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Best Midfielder</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="PFA_Young_Player_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:PFA_Young_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template:PFA Young Player of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:PFA_Young_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:PFA Young Player of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:PFA_Young_Player_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="PFA_Young_Player_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/PFA_Young_Player_of_the_Year" title="PFA Young Player of the Year">PFA Young Player of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap">1987: <a href="/wiki/Tony_Adams" title="Tony Adams">Adams</a> </span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1989: <a href="/wiki/Paul_Merson" title="Paul Merson">Merson</a> </span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <a href="/wiki/Nicolas_Anelka" title="Nicolas Anelka">Anelka</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <a href="/wiki/Harry_Kewell" title="Harry Kewell">Kewell</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <a href="/wiki/Steven_Gerrard" title="Steven Gerrard">Gerrard</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Craig_Bellamy" title="Craig Bellamy">Bellamy</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Jermaine_Jenas" title="Jermaine Jenas">Jenas</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Scott_Parker" title="Scott Parker">Parker</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Wayne_Rooney" title="Wayne Rooney">Rooney</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="/wiki/Wayne_Rooney" title="Wayne Rooney">Rooney</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Ronaldo</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/wiki/Cesc_F%C3%A0bregas" title="Cesc Fàbregas">Fàbregas</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Ashley_Young" title="Ashley Young">Young</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/James_Milner" title="James Milner">Milner</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="/wiki/Jack_Wilshere" title="Jack Wilshere">Wilshere</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="/wiki/Kyle_Walker" title="Kyle Walker">Walker</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Gareth_Bale" title="Gareth Bale">Bale</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Eden_Hazard" title="Eden Hazard">Hazard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Harry_Kane" title="Harry Kane">Kane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/Dele_Alli" title="Dele Alli">Alli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Dele_Alli" title="Dele Alli">Alli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Leroy_San%C3%A9" title="Leroy Sané">Sané</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Raheem_Sterling" title="Raheem Sterling">Sterling</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Trent_Alexander-Arnold" title="Trent Alexander-Arnold">Alexander-Arnold</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="FWA_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:FWA_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template:FWA Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:FWA_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:FWA Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:FWA_Footballer_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: white; color: navy; border:1px solid navy;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="FWA_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/FWA_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="FWA Footballer of the Year"><span style="color:navy;">FWA Footballer of the Year</span></a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" title="Template:Premier League Player of the Season"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" title="Template talk:Premier League Player of the Season"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" title="Premier League Player of the Season">Premier League Player of the Season</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1995: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Alan_Shearer" title="Alan Shearer">Shearer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Denmark" title="Denmark"><img alt="Denmark" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9c/Flag_of_Denmark.svg/15px-Flag_of_Denmark.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9c/Flag_of_Denmark.svg/23px-Flag_of_Denmark.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9c/Flag_of_Denmark.svg/30px-Flag_of_Denmark.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="387" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Peter_Schmeichel" title="Peter Schmeichel">Schmeichel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Juninho_Paulista" title="Juninho Paulista">Juninho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Michael_Owen" title="Michael Owen">Owen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Trinidad_and_Tobago" title="Trinidad and Tobago"><img alt="Trinidad and Tobago" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg/15px-Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg/23px-Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg/30px-Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Dwight_Yorke" title="Dwight Yorke">Yorke</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Phillips_(footballer)" title="Kevin Phillips (footballer)">Phillips</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Patrick_Vieira" title="Patrick Vieira">Vieira</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Sweden" title="Sweden"><img alt="Sweden" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/15px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/30px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1600" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Freddie_Ljungberg" title="Freddie Ljungberg">Ljungberg</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">van Nistelrooy</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Frank_Lampard" title="Frank Lampard">Lampard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Portugal" title="Portugal"><img alt="Portugal" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/15px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/23px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/30px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Portugal" title="Portugal"><img alt="Portugal" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/15px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/23px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/30px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Serbia" title="Serbia"><img alt="Serbia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Nemanja_Vidi%C4%87" title="Nemanja Vidi">Vidi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Wayne_Rooney" title="Wayne Rooney">Rooney</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Serbia" title="Serbia"><img alt="Serbia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Nemanja_Vidi%C4%87" title="Nemanja Vidi">Vidi</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Wales" title="Wales"><img alt="Wales" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_Wales_%281959%E2%80%93present%29.svg/15px-Flag_of_Wales_%281959%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_Wales_%281959%E2%80%93present%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Wales_%281959%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_Wales_%281959%E2%80%93present%29.svg/30px-Flag_of_Wales_%281959%E2%80%93present%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="830" data-file-height="498" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Gareth_Bale" title="Gareth Bale">Bale</a></span></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li>2019&#8211;20: <a href="/wiki/Ciro_Immobile" title="Ciro Immobile">Immobile</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Serie_A_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Serie_A_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template:Serie A Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Serie_A_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Serie A Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Serie_A_Footballer_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Serie_A_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Serie_A_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Serie A Footballer of the Year">Serie A Footballer of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%"><a href="/wiki/Gran_Gal%C3%A0_del_Calcio" title="Gran Galà del Calcio">Oscar del Calcio AIC</a></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="/wiki/Roberto_Mancini" title="Roberto Mancini">Mancini</a> </span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/David_Trezeguet" title="David Trezeguet">Trezeguet</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Pavel_Nedv%C4%9Bd" title="Pavel Nedvd">Nedvd</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Francesco_Totti" title="Francesco Totti">Totti</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Alberto_Gilardino" title="Alberto Gilardino">Gilardino</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="/wiki/Fabio_Cannavaro" title="Fabio Cannavaro">Cannavaro</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a href="/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/wiki/Zlatan_Ibrahimovi%C4%87" title="Zlatan Ibrahimovi">Ibrahimovi</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Zlatan_Ibrahimovi%C4%87" title="Zlatan Ibrahimovi">Ibrahimovi</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/Diego_Milito" title="Diego Milito">Milito</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%"><a href="/wiki/Gran_Gal%C3%A0_del_Calcio_AIC" class="mw-redirect" title="Gran Galà del Calcio AIC">Gran Galà del Calcio AIC</a></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="European_Golden_Shoe" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:European_Golden_Shoe" title="Template:European Golden Shoe"><abbr title="View this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:European_Golden_Shoe" title="Template talk:European Golden Shoe"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:European_Golden_Shoe&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="European_Golden_Shoe" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/European_Golden_Shoe" title="European Golden Shoe">European Golden Shoe</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%"><i><a href="/wiki/L%27%C3%89quipe" title="L&#39;Équipe">L'Équipe</a></i> award</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1967–68: <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1968–69: <a href="/wiki/Petar_Zhekov" title="Petar Zhekov">Zhekov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1969–70: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1970–71: <a href="/wiki/Josip_Skoblar" title="Josip Skoblar">Skoblar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1971–72: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1972–73: <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1973–74: <a href="/wiki/H%C3%A9ctor_Yazalde" title="Héctor Yazalde">Yazalde</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1974–75: <a href="/wiki/Dudu_Georgescu" title="Dudu Georgescu">Georgescu</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1975–76: <a href="/wiki/Sotiris_Kaiafas" title="Sotiris Kaiafas">Kaiafas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1976–77: <a href="/wiki/Dudu_Georgescu" title="Dudu Georgescu">Georgescu</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1977–78: <a href="/wiki/Hans_Krankl" title="Hans Krankl">Krankl</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1978–79: <a href="/wiki/Kees_Kist" title="Kees Kist">Kist</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1979–80: <a href="/wiki/Erwin_Vandenbergh" title="Erwin Vandenbergh">Vandenbergh</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1980–81: <a href="/wiki/Georgi_Slavkov" title="Georgi Slavkov">Slavkov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1981–82: <a href="/wiki/Wim_Kieft" title="Wim Kieft">Kieft</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1982–83: <a href="/wiki/Fernando_Gomes_(footballer)" title="Fernando Gomes (footballer)">Gomes</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1983–84: <a href="/wiki/Ian_Rush" title="Ian Rush">Rush</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1984–85: <a href="/wiki/Fernando_Gomes_(footballer)" title="Fernando Gomes (footballer)">Gomes</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1985–86: <a href="/wiki/Marco_van_Basten" title="Marco van Basten">Van Basten</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1986–87: <a href="/wiki/Rodion_C%C4%83m%C4%83taru" title="Rodion Cmtaru">Cmtaru</a> / <a href="/wiki/Toni_Polster" title="Toni Polster">Polster</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1987–88: <a href="/wiki/Tanju_%C3%87olak" title="Tanju Çolak">Çolak</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1988–89: <a href="/wiki/Dorin_Mateu%C8%9B" title="Dorin Mateu">Mateu</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1989–90: <a href="/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Hristo_Stoichkov" title="Hristo Stoichkov">Stoichkov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1990–91: <a href="/wiki/Darko_Pan%C4%8Dev" title="Darko Panev">Panev</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Unofficial</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%"><a href="/wiki/European_Sports_Media" title="European Sports Media">ESM</a> award</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="European_Cup_and_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" title="Template:UEFA Champions League top scorers"><abbr title="View this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" title="Template talk:UEFA Champions League top scorers"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="European_Cup_and_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/List_of_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" title="List of UEFA Champions League top scorers">European Cup and UEFA Champions League top scorers</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">European Cup</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li>1957–58: <a href="/wiki/Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Alfredo Di Stéfano">Di Stéfano</a></li>
<li>1958–59: <a href="/wiki/Just_Fontaine" title="Just Fontaine">Fontaine</a></li>
<li>1959–60: <a href="/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a></li>

<li>1961–62: <a href="/wiki/Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Alfredo Di Stéfano">Di Stéfano</a>, <a href="/wiki/Bent_L%C3%B8fqvist" title="Bent Løfqvist">Løfqvist</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a>, <a href="/wiki/Heinz_Strehl" title="Heinz Strehl">Strehl</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Justo_Tejada" title="Justo Tejada">Tejada</a></li>
<li>1962–63: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Altafini" title="José Altafini">Altafini</a></li>
<li>1963–64: <a href="/wiki/Vladica_Kova%C4%8Devi%C4%87" title="Vladica Kovaevi">Kovaevi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sandro_Mazzola" title="Sandro Mazzola">Mazzola</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a></li>
<li>1964–65: <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Torres_(footballer,_born_1938)" title="José Torres (footballer, born 1938)">Torres</a></li>
<li>1965–66: <a href="/wiki/Fl%C3%B3ri%C3%A1n_Albert" title="Flórián Albert">Albert</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></li>
<li>1966–67: <a href="/wiki/J%C3%BCrgen_Piepenburg" title="Jürgen Piepenburg">Piepenburg</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Paul_Van_Himst" title="Paul Van Himst">Van Himst</a></li>
<li>1967–68: <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></li>
<li>1968–69: <a href="/wiki/Denis_Law" title="Denis Law">Law</a></li>
<li>1969–70: <a href="/wiki/Mick_Jones_(footballer,_born_1945)" title="Mick Jones (footballer, born 1945)">Jones</a></li>
<li>1970–71: <a href="/wiki/Antonis_Antoniadis" title="Antonis Antoniadis">Antoniadis</a></li>
<li>1971–72: <a href="/wiki/Antal_Dunai" title="Antal Dunai">Dunai</a>, <a href="/wiki/Lou_Macari" title="Lou Macari">Macari</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Silvester_Taka%C4%8D" title="Silvester Taka">Taka</a></li>
<li>1972–73: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li>1973–74: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li>1974–75: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Eduard_Markarov" title="Eduard Markarov">Markarov</a></li>
<li>1975–76: <a href="/wiki/Jupp_Heynckes" title="Jupp Heynckes">Heynckes</a></li>
<li>1976–77: <a href="/wiki/Franco_Cucinotta" title="Franco Cucinotta">Cucinotta</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li>1977–78: <a href="/wiki/Allan_Simonsen" title="Allan Simonsen">Simonsen</a></li>
<li>1978–79: <a href="/wiki/Claudio_Sulser" title="Claudio Sulser">Sulser</a></li>
<li>1979–80: <a href="/wiki/S%C3%B8ren_Lerby" title="Søren Lerby">Lerby</a></li>
<li>1980–81: <a href="/wiki/Terry_McDermott" title="Terry McDermott">McDermott</a>, <a href="/wiki/Karl-Heinz_Rummenigge" title="Karl-Heinz Rummenigge">Rummenigge</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Graeme_Souness" title="Graeme Souness">Souness</a></li>
<li>1981–82: <a href="/wiki/Dieter_Hoene%C3%9F" title="Dieter Hoeneß">Hoeneß</a></li>
<li>1982–83: <a href="/wiki/Paolo_Rossi" title="Paolo Rossi">Rossi</a></li>
<li>1983–84: <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Sokol_(footballer,_born_1954)" title="Viktor Sokol (footballer, born 1954)">Sokol</a></li>
<li>1984–85: <a href="/wiki/Torbj%C3%B6rn_Nilsson" title="Torbjörn Nilsson">Nilsson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Michel_Platini" title="Michel Platini">Platini</a></li>
<li>1985–86: <a href="/wiki/Torbj%C3%B6rn_Nilsson" title="Torbjörn Nilsson">Nilsson</a></li>
<li>1986–87: <a href="/wiki/Borislav_Cvetkovi%C4%87" title="Borislav Cvetkovi">Cvetkovi</a></li>
<li>1987–88: <a href="/wiki/Rui_%C3%81guas_(footballer)" title="Rui Águas (footballer)">R. Águas</a>, <a href="/wiki/Jean-Marc_Ferreri" title="Jean-Marc Ferreri">Ferreri</a>, <a href="/wiki/Gheorghe_Hagi" title="Gheorghe Hagi">Hagi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rabah_Madjer" title="Rabah Madjer">Madjer</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ally_McCoist" title="Ally McCoist">McCoist</a>, <a href="/wiki/M%C3%ADchel_(footballer,_born_1963)" title="Míchel (footballer, born 1963)">Míchel</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Petar_Nov%C3%A1k" title="Petar Novák">Novák</a></li>
<li>1988–89: <a href="/wiki/Marco_van_Basten" title="Marco van Basten">Van Basten</a></li>
<li>1989–90: <a href="/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></li>
<li>1990–91: <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pacult" title="Peter Pacult">Pacult</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a></li>
<li>1991–92: <a href="/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Sergei_Yuran" title="Sergei Yuran">Yuran</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">UEFA Champions League</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Premier_League_Golden_Boot" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Premier_League_Golden_Boot" title="Template:Premier League Golden Boot"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Premier_League_Golden_Boot" title="Template talk:Premier League Golden Boot"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Premier_League_Golden_Boot&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Premier_League_Golden_Boot" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Premier_League_Golden_Boot" title="Premier League Golden Boot">Premier League Golden Boot</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1993: <a href="/wiki/Teddy_Sheringham" title="Teddy Sheringham">Sheringham</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <a href="/wiki/Andy_Cole" title="Andy Cole">Cole</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <a href="/wiki/Alan_Shearer" title="Alan Shearer">Shearer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <a href="/wiki/Alan_Shearer" title="Alan Shearer">Shearer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="/wiki/Alan_Shearer" title="Alan Shearer">Shearer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <a href="/wiki/Dion_Dublin" title="Dion Dublin">Dublin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Michael_Owen" title="Michael Owen">Owen</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Chris_Sutton" title="Chris Sutton">Sutton</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <a href="/wiki/Jimmy_Floyd_Hasselbaink" title="Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink">Hasselbaink</a>, <a href="/wiki/Michael_Owen" title="Michael Owen">Owen</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Dwight_Yorke" title="Dwight Yorke">Yorke</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Phillips_(footballer)" title="Kevin Phillips (footballer)">Phillips</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <a href="/wiki/Jimmy_Floyd_Hasselbaink" title="Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink">Hasselbaink</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">Van Nistelrooy</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a href="/wiki/Didier_Drogba" title="Didier Drogba">Drogba</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Nicolas_Anelka" title="Nicolas Anelka">Anelka</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/Didier_Drogba" title="Didier Drogba">Drogba</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="/wiki/Dimitar_Berbatov" title="Dimitar Berbatov">Berbatov</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Carlos_Tevez" title="Carlos Tevez">Tevez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="/wiki/Robin_van_Persie" title="Robin van Persie">Van Persie</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Robin_van_Persie" title="Robin van Persie">Van Persie</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Luis Suárez">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Ag%C3%BCero" title="Sergio Agüero">Agüero</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/Harry_Kane" title="Harry Kane">Kane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Harry_Kane" title="Harry Kane">Kane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Mohamed_Salah" title="Mohamed Salah">Salah</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Pierre-Emerick_Aubameyang" title="Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang">Aubameyang</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sadio_Man%C3%A9" title="Sadio Mané">Mané</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Mohamed_Salah" title="Mohamed Salah">Salah</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Jamie_Vardy" title="Jamie Vardy">Vardy</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/w/index.php?title=Aitor_Hueg%C3%BAn&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Aitor Huegún (page does not exist)">Huegún</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=Alejandro_Su%C3%A1rez_Castroagud%C3%ADn&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Alejandro Suárez Castroagudín (page does not exist)">Alejandro</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/I%C3%B1aki_Mu%C3%B1oz" title="Iñaki Muñoz">Muñoz</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a href="/wiki/Javier_Saviola" title="Javier Saviola">Saviola</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/w/index.php?title=Miguel_%C3%81ngel_Soler_Barber%C3%A0&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Miguel Ángel Soler Barberà (page does not exist)">Migue</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Luis_Fabiano" class="mw-redirect" title="Luis Fabiano">Luis Fabiano</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/Maxi_Rodr%C3%ADguez" title="Maxi Rodríguez">Maxi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a> &amp; <a class="mw-selflink selflink">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="/wiki/Pablo_Infante" title="Pablo Infante">Infante</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Diego_Costa" title="Diego Costa">Costa</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Iago_Aspas" title="Iago Aspas">Aspas</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Neymar" title="Neymar">Neymar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/John_Guidetti" title="John Guidetti">Guidetti</a>, <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Munir_El_Haddadi" title="Munir El Haddadi">Munir</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C3%81lvaro_Negredo" title="Álvaro Negredo">Negredo</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Luis Suárez">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Wissam_Ben_Yedder" title="Wissam Ben Yedder">Ben Yedder</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/V%C3%ADctor_Curto" title="Víctor Curto">Curto</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/%C3%81ngel_Rodr%C3%ADguez_(Spanish_footballer)" title="Ángel Rodríguez (Spanish footballer)">Ángel</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Karl_Toko_Ekambi" title="Karl Toko Ekambi">Toko Ekambi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

Ronaldo</a> </span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Romelu_Lukaku" title="Romelu Lukaku">Lukaku</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Sir_Matt_Busby_Player_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:#e20e0e;color:#fff;border:1px solid black"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Sir_Matt_Busby_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template:Sir Matt Busby Player of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style="background:#e20e0e;color:#fff;border:1px solid black;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Sir_Matt_Busby_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Sir Matt Busby Player of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background:#e20e0e;color:#fff;border:1px solid black;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Sir_Matt_Busby_Player_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background:#e20e0e;color:#fff;border:1px solid black;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Sir_Matt_Busby_Player_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Sir_Matt_Busby_Player_of_the_Year" title="Sir Matt Busby Player of the Year"><span style="color:white;">Sir Matt Busby Player of the Year</span></a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Trofeo_Alfredo_Di_Stéfano" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Trofeo_Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Template:Trofeo Alfredo Di Stéfano"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Trofeo_Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Template talk:Trofeo Alfredo Di Stéfano"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Trofeo_Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Trofeo_Alfredo_Di_Stéfano" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Trofeo_Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Trofeo Alfredo Di Stéfano">Trofeo Alfredo Di Stéfano</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li>2007–08: <a href="/wiki/Ra%C3%BAl_(footballer)" title="Raúl (footballer)">Raúl</a></li>
<li>2008–09: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2009–10: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2010–11: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2011–12: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">C. Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2012–13: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">C. Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2013–14: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">C. Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2014–15: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2015–16: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">C. Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2016–17: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2017–18: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2018–19: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></li>
<li>2019–20: <a href="/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Khabib_Nurmagomedov" title="Khabib Nurmagomedov">Khabib Nurmagomedov</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
